SEARCH
Package org.apache.turbine.services.jsp

Klasse TurbineJspService

java.lang.Object
org.apache.turbine.services.BaseInitable
org.apache.turbine.services.BaseService
org.apache.turbine.services.TurbineBaseService
org.apache.turbine.services.template.BaseTemplateEngineService
org.apache.turbine.services.jsp.TurbineJspService
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Initable, JspService, Service, TemplateEngineService
public class TurbineJspService extends BaseTemplateEngineService implements JspService
This is a Service that can process JSP templates from within a Turbine screen.
Autor:
John D. McNally, Jason van Zyl, Daniel Rall, Henning P. Schmiedehausen

    • init

      public void init() throws InitializationException
      Load all configured components and initialize them. This is a zero parameter variant which queries the Turbine Servlet for its config.
      Angegeben von:
      init in Schnittstelle Initable
      Setzt außer Kraft:

      Löst aus:
      InitializationException - Something went wrong in the init stage

    • addDefaultObjects

      public void addDefaultObjects(PipelineData pipelineData)
      Adds some convenience objects to the request. For example an instance of TemplateLink which can be used to generate links to other templates.
      Angegeben von:
      addDefaultObjects in Schnittstelle JspService
      Parameter:
      pipelineData - the Turbine PipelineData object

    • handleRequest

      public void handleRequest(PipelineData pipelineData, String templateName, boolean isForward) throws TurbineException
      executes the JSP given by templateName.
      Angegeben von:
      handleRequest in Schnittstelle JspService
      Parameter:
      pipelineData - A PipelineData Object
      templateName - The template to execute
      isForward - whether to perform a forward or include.
      Löst aus:
      TurbineException - If a problem occurred while executing the JSP
